# The GTM OS — thegtmos.ai
> The GTM Operating System — a knowledge base for go-to-market engineering. Clay workflows, outbound automation, intent-driven prospecting, and the infrastructure behind modern GTM.

## About
- Author: Shawn Tenam
- Part of the ShawnOS network (shawnos.ai, thegtmos.ai, thecontentos.ai)
- Architecture: Next.js app in a shared monorepo

## Content Types
- GTM Knowledge Base: /gtm-knowledge — Go-to-market terms, frameworks, and playbooks
- Clay Wiki: /clay-wiki — Clay.com workflows, enrichment plays, and integration guides
- How-To Wiki: /how-to — GTM engineering guides (cross-linked from shawnos.ai)

## Feeds
- RSS: /feed.xml, /feed/clay-wiki.xml, /feed/knowledge.xml

## Key Topics
- Clay.com workflows and enrichment
- Outbound sales automation (HeyReach, Instantly)
- Intent data and signal-based prospecting
- Lead scoring and qualification
- GTM infrastructure and tooling
